name.ja: <ruby>ＧＰ<rt>ゴールド・プライド</rt></ruby>－アサシネーター

text.en: If your LP are lower than your opponent's: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish 1 other "Gold Pride" monster from your hand, face-up field, or GY that has a Level; Special Summon 1 "Gold Pride Token" (Machine/DARK/ATK 0/DEF 0) with the same Level, also this card cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon for the rest of this turn, unless it is for a "Gold Pride" monster. You can only use each effect of "Gold Pride - Assassinator" once per turn.
